https://www.justonecookbook.com/kimchi-c: {"img":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Kimchi-Jjigae-Kimchi-Stew-1711-I.jpg","url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/kimchi-chigae","title":"Kimchi Jjigae","originalTitle":"キムチチゲ","ingredients":[{"name":"Medium-firm tofu","quantity":198,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Green onions","quantity":2,"unit":"pieces"},{"name":"Pork belly","quantity":113,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Toasted sesame oil","quantity":15,"unit":"milliliters"},{"name":"Kosher salt","quantity":1.5,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Black pepper","quantity":0.5,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Sake","quantity":15,"unit":"milliliters"},{"name":"Kimchi","quantity":284,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Garlic","quantity":2,"unit":"cloves"},{"name":"Gochugaru (Korean pepper flakes)","quantity":5,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Gochujang (Korean chili paste)","quantity":10,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Soy sauce","quantity":10,"unit":"milliliters"},{"name":"Sugar","quantity":4,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Anchovy stock (Iriko Dashi)","quantity":480,"unit":"milliliters"},{"name":"Kimchi juice","quantity":60,"unit":"milliliters"}],"instructions":["Prepare the anchovy stock by soaking dried anchovies in water for 30 minutes, then simmering for 10 minutes.","Slice the tofu and green onions and cut the pork belly into small pieces.","Heat sesame oil in a pot over medium heat, then add the pork belly and cook until no longer pink.","Add the white parts of the green onions and kimchi, cooking until the kimchi is tender.","Incorporate garlic, gochugaru, gochujang, soy sauce, and sugar into the mixture.","Pour in the anchovy stock and add kimchi juice. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 10 minutes.","Carefully place the tofu on top and cook until heated through, around 5 minutes.","Serve hot with the green parts of the green onions as garnish."],"tags":[{"name":"Kimchi","key":"kimchi"},{"name":"Tofu","key":"tofu"},{"name":"Pork","key":"pork"},{"name":"Korean chili paste","key":"gochujang"},{"name":"Korean pepper flakes","key":"gochugaru"},{"name":"Anchovy stock","key":"anchovy-stock"},{"name":"Garlic","key":"garlic"},{"name":"Spring onion","key":"spring-onion"},{"name":"Sesame oil","key":"sesame-oil"},{"name":"Sugar","key":"sugar"},{"name":"Soy sauce","key":"soy-sauce"},{"name":"Asian","key":"asian"},{"name":"Main Course","key":"main-course"},{"name":"Dinner","key":"dinner"},{"name":"Comfort Food","key":"comfort-food"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/negiyaki: {"img":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Nagiyaki-9508-I-1.jpg","url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/negiyaki","title":"Negiyaki","originalTitle":"ねぎ焼き","ingredients":[{"name":"Green onions/scallions","quantity":227,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Sliced pork belly","quantity":113,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Katsuobushi (dried bonito flakes)","quantity":56,"unit":"g"},{"name":"All-purpose flour","quantity":65,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Baking powder","quantity":2,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Tenkasu (tempura scraps)","quantity":20,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Large eggs","quantity":2,"unit":"units"},{"name":"Soy sauce","quantity":2,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Water","quantity":80,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"Neutral oil","quantity":15,"unit":"ml"}],"instructions":["Prepare ingredients: Chop green onions/scallions and cut pork belly into strips.","Mix batter: Toss chopped green onions in the flour to coat. Add baking powder, tempura scraps, katsuobushi, eggs, soy sauce, and water. Mix until just combined.","Cook: Use two frying pans and divide the batter in half to cook two pancakes. Sprinkle katsuobushi and spread pork belly on top before flipping.","Serve: Brush with soy sauce or okonomi sauce and drizzle with Japanese mayonnaise."],"tags":[{"name":"Green onions","key":"green-onions"},{"name":"Pork belly","key":"pork-belly"},{"name":"Katsuobushi","key":"katsuobushi"},{"name":"All-purpose flour","key":"all-purpose-flour"},{"name":"Baking powder","key":"baking-powder"},{"name":"Eggs","key":"eggs"},{"name":"Soy sauce","key":"soy-sauce"},{"name":"Vegetable oil","key":"vegetable-oil"},{"name":"Japanese","key":"japanese"},{"name":"Snack","key":"snack"},{"name":"Quick & Easy","key":"quick-easy"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/garlic-m: {"img":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Garlic-Miso-Chicken-Wings-4386-I-1.jpg","url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/garlic-miso-chicken-wings","title":"Easy Garlic Miso Chicken Wings","originalTitle":"ガーリック味噌チキン","ingredients":[{"name":"chicken wings","quantity":450,"unit":"g"},{"name":"garlic","quantity":4,"unit":"cloves"},{"name":"miso","quantity":30,"unit":"g"},{"name":"soy sauce","quantity":30,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"mirin","quantity":30,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"Japanese kewpie mayonnaise","quantity":0,"unit":"g"},{"name":"shichimi togarashi","quantity":0,"unit":"g"}],"instructions":["Mix minced garlic, miso, soy sauce, and mirin in a resealable plastic bag.","Pat dry chicken wings with paper towels and prick the skin with a fork.","Add chicken wings to the plastic bag and coat them well with the marinade.","Let them marinate in the refrigerator for at least 6 hours (preferably overnight).","Preheat the oven to 220ºC. Put wings on an oven-safe wire rack placed on a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes.","At the 30-minute mark, flip the wings and return them to the oven for another 15 minutes.","Serve immediately with optional Japanese kewpie mayonnaise and shichimi togarashi on the side."],"tags":[{"name":"Chicken Wing","key":"chicken-wing"},{"name":"Garlic","key":"garlic"},{"name":"Miso","key":"miso"},{"name":"Soy Sauce","key":"soy-sauce"},{"name":"Mirin","key":"mirin"},{"name":"Japanese Kewpie Mayonnaise","key":"japanese-kewpie-mayonnaise"},{"name":"Shichimi Togarashi","key":"shichimi-togarashi"},{"name":"Main Course","key":"main-course"},{"name":"Japanese Cuisine","key":"japanese-cuisine"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/quick-ko: {"img":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Fresh-Kimchi-6968-I.jpg","url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/quick-korean-fresh-kimchi","title":"Korean Fresh Kimchi","originalTitle":"한국 신선 김치","ingredients":[{"name":"water","quantity":480,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"coarse sea salt","quantity":80,"unit":"g"},{"name":"napa cabbage","quantity":1134,"unit":"g"},{"name":"green onions","quantity":3,"unit":"unit"},{"name":"garlic","quantity":5,"unit":"cloves"},{"name":"gochugaru","quantity":32,"unit":"g"},{"name":"fish sauce","quantity":30,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"apricot jam","quantity":30,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"toasted white sesame seeds","quantity":15,"unit":"g"}],"instructions":["Cut napa cabbage into quarters and remove the tough core.","In a large bowl, mix water and coarse sea salt until dissolved.","Add napa cabbage to the salted water and let soak for 40 minutes, tossing halfway.","Rinse cabbage under cold running water to remove excess salt, then drain well.","In another bowl, prepare the kimchi paste by mixing green onions, minced garlic, gochugaru, fish sauce, apricot jam, and sesame seeds.","Combine the drained cabbage with the kimchi paste using plastic gloves to avoid staining your hands.","Mix thoroughly, allowing the cabbage to absorb the flavors of the paste.","Transfer to airtight containers and store in the refrigerator."],"tags":[{"name":"Napa Cabbage","key":"napa-cabbage"},{"name":"Coarse Sea Salt","key":"coarse-sea-salt"},{"name":"Garlic","key":"garlic"},{"name":"Green Onions","key":"green-onions"},{"name":"Gochugaru","key":"gochugaru"},{"name":"Fish Sauce","key":"fish-sauce"},{"name":"Apricot Jam","key":"apricot-jam"},{"name":"Toasted White Sesame Seeds","key":"toasted-white-sesame-seeds"},{"name":"Snack","key":"snack"},{"name":"Korean Cuisine","key":"korean-cuisine"},{"name":"Vegetarian","key":"vegetarian"}]}

{"img":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Fresh-Kimchi-6968-I.jpg","url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/quick-korean","title":"Korean Fresh Kimchi","originalTitle":"한국식 생김치 (Baechu Geotjeroi)","ingredients":[{"name":"water","quantity":480,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"coarse sea salt","quantity":80,"unit":"g"},{"name":"napa cabbage","quantity":1135,"unit":"g"},{"name":"green onions","quantity":3,"unit":"pieces"},{"name":"garlic","quantity":5,"unit":"cloves"},{"name":"gochugaru (Korean red pepper flakes)","quantity":30,"unit":"g"},{"name":"fish sauce (or vegan fish sauce)","quantity":30,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"apricot jam (or apple jam)","quantity":30,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"toasted white sesame seeds","quantity":15,"unit":"g"}],"instructions":["Mix 480 ml water with 80 g coarse sea salt until dissolved.","Cut 1135 g napa cabbage into quarters and remove the core. Tear into 3 cm pieces and place in a large bowl.","Pour salted water over the cabbage and press down to absorb the salt. Let soak for 40 minutes, tossing halfway through.","Drain the cabbage and rinse under cold water for about 1 minute. Drain well for another 5 minutes.","In a bowl, combine 3 chopped green onions, minced garlic, 30 g gochugaru, 30 ml fish sauce, 30 ml apricot jam, and 15 g sesame seeds. Mix well to create the kimchi paste.","Add the drained cabbage to the kimchi paste and mix well using gloved hands, ensuring cabbage absorbs the flavor.","Serve immediately, garnished with extra sesame seeds."],"tags":[{"name":"Napa Cabbage","key":"napa-cabbage"},{"name":"Coarse Sea Salt","key":"coarse-sea-salt"},{"name":"Garlic","key":"garlic"},{"name":"Green Onions","key":"green-onions"},{"name":"Gochugaru","key":"gochugaru"},{"name":"Fish Sauce","key":"fish-sauce"},{"name":"Apricot Jam","key":"apricot-jam"},{"name":"Toasted White Sesame Seeds","key":"toasted-white-sesame-seeds"},{"name":"Side Dish","key":"side-dish"},{"name":"Vegetarian","key":"vegetarian"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/quick-k: {"img":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Fresh-Kimchi-6968-I.jpg","url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/quick-k","title":"Korean Fresh Kimchi","originalTitle":"韓国の新鮮 キムチ","ingredients":[{"name":"Napa cabbage","quantity":1134,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Coarse sea salt","quantity":100,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Garlic","quantity":35,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Green onions","quantity":3,"unit":"pieces"},{"name":"Gochugaru (Korean red pepper flakes)","quantity":60,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Fish sauce","quantity":30,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"Apricot jam","quantity":30,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"Toasted white sesame seeds","quantity":15,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Water","quantity":500,"unit":"ml"}],"instructions":["Mix 500 ml of water with 100 g of coarse sea salt until dissolved.","Cut the 1134 g napa cabbage into quarters, remove the core, and cut into 1-inch pieces.","Soak the cabbage pieces in the salted water for 40 minutes, tossing halfway through.","Rinse the cabbage pieces under cold water to remove excess salt and drain well.","In a separate bowl, combine 3 chopped green onions, minced garlic, 60 g gochugaru, 30 ml fish sauce, 30 ml apricot jam, and 15 g toasted white sesame seeds to make the kimchi paste.","Mix the well-drained cabbage with the kimchi paste using gloved hands to ensure even coating.","Serve immediately, garnished with extra sesame seeds if desired."],"tags":[{"name":"Kimchi","key":"kimchi"},{"name":"Napa Cabbage","key":"napa-cabbage"},{"name":"Garlic","key":"garlic"},{"name":"Green Onions","key":"green-onions"},{"name":"Gochugaru","key":"gochugaru"},{"name":"Fish Sauce","key":"fish-sauce"},{"name":"Apricot Jam","key":"apricot-jam"},{"name":"Toasted Sesame Seeds","key":"toasted-sesame-seeds"},{"name":"Water","key":"water"},{"name":"Side Dish","key":"side-dish"},{"name":"Vegetarian","key":"vegetarian"}]}
https://www.ica.se/recept/rod-linssoppa-: {"img":"https://assets.icanet.se/e_sharpen:80,q_auto,dpr_1.25,w_1200,h_1200,c_lfill/imagevaultfiles/id_249694/cf_259/rod_linssoppa_med_kokos_och_tomat_.jpg","url":"https://www.ica.se/recept/rod-linssoppa-med-kokos-och-tomat-717878","title":"Röd Linssoppa med Kokos och Tomat","originalTitle":"röd linssoppa med kokos och tomat","ingredients":[{"name":"Yellow onion","quantity":1,"unit":"piece"},{"name":"Olive oil","quantity":15,"unit":"milliliters"},{"name":"Dried red lentils","quantity":125,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Crushed tomatoes","quantity":500,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Coconut milk","quantity":400,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Water","quantity":500,"unit":"milliliters"},{"name":"Vegetable bouillon cubes","quantity":2,"unit":"piece"},{"name":"Lime juice","quantity":1,"unit":"half"},{"name":"Liquid honey or sugar","quantity":7.5,"unit":"milliliters"},{"name":"Salt","quantity":1,"unit":"teaspoon"},{"name":"Black pepper","quantity":1,"unit":"teaspoon"},{"name":"Fresh coriander","quantity":1,"unit":"bunch"},{"name":"Naan bread","quantity":1,"unit":"piece"}],"instructions":["Peel, halve, and chop the onion. Sauté the onion in olive oil in a large pot until soft.","Add the lentils, crushed tomatoes, coconut milk, water, and bouillon cubes to the pot. Bring to a boil and let simmer with the lid on until the lentils are soft, about 15 minutes.","If needed, add more water to adjust the consistency. Taste and season with lime juice, honey, salt, and pepper.","Serve with a sprinkle of fresh coriander on top and naan bread on the side."],"tags":[{"name":"Red Lentils","key":"red-lentils"},{"name":"Coconut Milk","key":"coconut-milk"},{"name":"Crushed Tomatoes","key":"crushed-tomatoes"},{"name":"Olive Oil","key":"olive-oil"},{"name":"Lime Juice","key":"lime-juice"},{"name":"Honey","key":"honey"},{"name":"Vegetable Bouillon","key":"vegetable-bouillon"},{"name":"Fresh Coriander","key":"fresh-coriander"},{"name":"Naan Bread","key":"naan-bread"},{"name":"Breakfast","key":"breakfast"},{"name":"Lunch","key":"lunch"},{"name":"Dinner","key":"dinner"},{"name":"Vegetarian","key":"vegetarian"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/kimchi: {"img":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Kimchi-Jjigae-Kimchi-Stew-1711-I.jpg","url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/kimchi","title":"Kimchi Jjigae (Kimchi Stew)","originalTitle":"キムチチゲ","ingredients":[{"name":"Medium-Firm Tofu","quantity":198,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Green Onions","quantity":2,"unit":"pieces"},{"name":"Pork Belly","quantity":113,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Toasted Sesame Oil","quantity":15,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"Kosher Salt","quantity":1,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Freshly Ground Black Pepper","quantity":0.5,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Sake","quantity":15,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"Napa Cabbage Kimchi","quantity":400,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Garlic","quantity":2,"unit":"cloves"},{"name":"Gochugaru (Korean Red Pepper Flakes)","quantity":4,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Gochujang (Korean Chili Paste)","quantity":4,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Soy Sauce","quantity":10,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"Sugar","quantity":5,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Anchovy Stock (Iriko Dashi)","quantity":480,"unit":"ml"},{"name":"Kimchi Juice (Optional)","quantity":60,"unit":"ml"}],"instructions":["Prepare anchovy stock by soaking ¼ cup iriko in 480 ml water for at least 30 minutes.","Cut tofu into 1.3 cm slices, slice green onions, and cut pork belly into 3-5 cm pieces.","In a pot over medium heat, add sesame oil and pork belly. Cook until no longer pink, about 2-3 minutes.","Add the white part of green onions, kimchi, garlic, and sauté for 2-3 minutes.","Incorporate gochugaru, gochujang, soy sauce, and sugar. Stir well.","Add the anchovy stock and kimchi juice, bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer for 10 minutes.","Carefully add tofu slices and cook for 5 more minutes.","Garnish with the green parts of green onions and serve hot."],"tags":[{"name":"Pork","key":"pork"},{"name":"Tofu","key":"tofu"},{"name":"Kimchi","key":"kimchi"},{"name":"Garlic","key":"garlic"},{"name":"Green Onions","key":"green-onions"},{"name":"Sake","key":"sake"},{"name":"Gochugaru","key":"gochugaru"},{"name":"Gochujang","key":"gochujang"},{"name":"Soy Sauce","key":"soy-sauce"},{"name":"Sugar","key":"sugar"},{"name":"Anchovy Stock","key":"anchovy-stock"},{"name":"Asian","key":"asian"},{"name":"Main Course","key":"main-course"},{"name":"Comfort Food","key":"comfort-food"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/: {"img":null,"url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/","title":"Sushi Roll","originalTitle":"寿司ロール","ingredients":[{"name":"rice","quantity":300,"unit":"g"},{"name":"nori seaweed","quantity":4,"unit":"sheets"},{"name":"sashimi-grade fish","quantity":200,"unit":"g"},{"name":"vegetable fillings (e.g., cucumber, avocado)","quantity":150,"unit":"g"}],"instructions":["Rinse the rice under cold water until the water runs clear, then cook according to the package instructions.","Prepare your vegetable fillings by slicing them thinly.","Lay a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat with the shiny side facing down.","Spread a thin layer of rice over the nori, leaving a small border at the top.","Arrange your sashimi and vegetable fillings in a line along the bottom edge of the rice-covered nori.","Using the sushi mat, roll the nori tightly away from you, applying gentle pressure to form a cylinder.","Seal the edge of the nori with a little water, then slice the roll into bite-sized pieces.","Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger."],"tags":[{"name":"Sushi","key":"sushi"},{"name":"Rice","key":"rice"},{"name":"Seafood","key":"seafood"},{"name":"Vegetable","key":"vegetable"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/pancakes: {"img":null,"url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/pancakes","title":"Matcha Cookies","originalTitle":"抹茶クッキー","ingredients":[{"name":"Matcha powder","quantity":30,"unit":"g"},{"name":"All-purpose flour","quantity":90,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Sugar","quantity":60,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Butter","quantity":40,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Egg","quantity":1,"unit":"piece"}],"instructions":["Preheat the oven to 180°C.","In a bowl, cream together the butter and sugar.","Add the egg and mix well.","Sift together matcha powder and flour; incorporate into the butter mixture.","Shape the dough into small balls and place them on a baking tray.","Bake for 10-12 minutes until the edges are lightly browned."],"tags":[{"name":"Matcha Powder","key":"matcha-powder"},{"name":"All-Purpose Flour","key":"all-purpose-flour"},{"name":"Sugar","key":"sugar"},{"name":"Butter","key":"butter"},{"name":"Egg","key":"egg"},{"name":"Dessert","key":"dessert"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/waffles: {"img":null,"url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/waffles","title":"Matcha Cookies","originalTitle":"抹茶クッキー","ingredients":[{"name":"Matcha powder","quantity":30,"unit":"g"},{"name":"All-purpose flour","quantity":120,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Butter","quantity":70,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Sugar","quantity":60,"unit":"g"},{"name":"Egg","quantity":1,"unit":"whole"},{"name":"Salt","quantity":1,"unit":"g"}],"instructions":["Preheat the oven to 180°C.","In a bowl, mix the matcha powder, flour, and salt together.","In a separate bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.","Add the egg to the butter mixture and mix until combined.","Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture and stir until a dough forms.","Scoop out small portions of dough and shape into balls.","Place the balls on a baking tray lined with parchment paper and flatten slightly.","Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are lightly golden.","Let cool before serving."],"tags":[{"name":"Matcha powder","key":"matcha-powder"},{"name":"All-purpose flour","key":"all-purpose-flour"},{"name":"Butter","key":"butter"},{"name":"Sugar","key":"sugar"},{"name":"Egg","key":"egg"},{"name":"Salt","key":"salt"},{"name":"Dessert","key":"dessert"}]}
https://www.justonecookbook.com/cookies: {"img":null,"url":"https://www.justonecookbook.com/cookies","title":"Matcha Cookies","originalTitle":"抹茶クッキー","ingredients":[{"name":"Matcha powder","quantity":40,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Butter","quantity":115,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Sugar","quantity":100,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Egg","quantity":1,"unit":"piece"},{"name":"Flour","quantity":150,"unit":"grams"},{"name":"Baking powder","quantity":5,"unit":"grams"}],"instructions":["Preheat the oven to 170°C (340°F).","In a bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.","Add the egg and mix well.","In another bowl, sift together the matcha, flour, and baking powder.","Gradually combine the dry ingredients with the wet mixture until a dough forms.","Shape the dough into small balls and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.","Flatten each cookie slightly and bake for about 10-12 minutes until edges are lightly golden.","Let cool before serving."],"tags":[{"name":"Matcha Powder","key":"matcha-powder"},{"name":"Butter","key":"butter"},{"name":"Sugar","key":"sugar"},{"name":"Egg","key":"egg"},{"name":"Flour","key":"flour"},{"name":"Baking Powder","key":"baking-powder"},{"name":"Dessert","key":"dessert"}]}
